plot: John Oliver analyzes the mass deportation crisis under Trump and examines whether Tasers are as safe and effective as the manufacturer claims, or whether they require regulation as a lethal weapon.

John Oliver discusses how Trump Adminstration is mishandling the mass deportation situation. They he did a deep dive on whether Tasers are as safe or even effective as the company claims or it needs proper regulations to treat it as a deadly force.—Niaz Islam Arif
